intro: The v-subheader component is used to separate sections of lists.

inset.heading: Inset
inset.intro: inset subheaders are moved 72px to the right. This gives you the option to line them up with list items and inset dividers.

grid.heading: Grid
grid.intro: A subheader can add context to what a user is looking at.

menu.heading: Menu
menu.intro: Using a subheader can help separate different types of actions.

social.heading: Social media
social.intro: Using a subheader with social media interaction.
